Watch As “South Park” Parodies Lorde, 2pac, Michael Jackson, Nicki Minaj and Iggy Azalea

posted by Andres Tardio on December 4, 2014 in News
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of

South Park strikes again. This time, the program parodies Nicki Minaj, Iggy Azalea (who is meant to perform with a hologram of Michael Jackson), and Lorde, among others. During the episode, Randy Marsh, um, Lorde and Iggy get into a fight. The MJ hologram is on the loose and a 2Pac hologram is brought to life to “take care of the situation.” Meanwhile, the South Park gang explores the world of YouTube and the technology-obsessed. Check the episode below and then peep the gallery for a recap of the stars parodied in the show.

Related: Lorde Sings “The Lorde Song” On “South Park”

Tags:  2pac, iggy azalea, Lorde, Nicki Minaj, south park
